p: Study phases and activities are shown in Table 2. The main framework of this study was based on the previous research developed by Aldunce et al. ( 2014b), where a systematic literature review of climate change resilience concept was performed for articles published between 2000 and 2012. 1 As a starting point for input into our workshops, we used the identified 15 determinants and 33 attributes defined for resilience (Table 2).
